Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 1 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Abdelaziz Bouteflika, patirengan a romi'ad i 1999 a katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad miheca saka 4 folad saka 27 a romi'ad.
